subject: Web3
title: NFTs as Event Tickets
description: A fast breakdown of NFTs as Event Tickets for builders.

hook.text: Scalpers buy concert tickets and resell them at 10x the price. NFT tickets could stop that.

buildup.text: An NFT ticket can have smart contract rules: maximum resale price, royalties back to the artist, no counterfeits.

discovery.text: After the event, the ticket becomes a collectible â€” a digital souvenir proving you were there.

twist.text: Ticketmaster and Live Nation control ticketing. They have no incentive to adopt a system that reduces their fees.

climax.text: NFT ticketing works in theory. In practice, the industry incumbents are blocking adoption.

punchline.text: The perfect ticket system exists. The industry doesn't want it.

quiz.question: How could NFT tickets prevent scalping?
options: Smart contracts can enforce maximum resale prices
